ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Financing (Ninth Poverty Reduction Support Development Policy Financing) to the Republic of Benin The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the Republic of Benin a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 13,100,000. The purpose of said credit is to accelerate economic growth, reduce poverty and increase opportunities for equitable growth in Benin by focusing on the following two program objectives: (i) promoting good governance and high-quality public financial management; and (ii) strengthening private-sector competitiveness. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the program in support of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said program is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Benin and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Benin. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said program merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said program for such assistance.
ï»¿Republic ofBenin - 2 - Ninth Poverty Reduction Support Development Policy Financing COMMITTEE Senior Vice President aUd Group General Counsel Nominee Selected by Governor for Republic of Benin legional Vice President Africa Region ice President, Concessional Finanke and Global Partnerships Senior Vice President, Development Economics and Chief Economist Dated at Washington, D.C.
